item.description:
Boston's best young professionals New Year's Eve event 14 years running. Saturday, December 31, 2011 Seaport Boston Hotel 7:30 pm to 2am Featuring The Felix Brown Band and DJ Samual L.

What is included: Multiple options including the following:

  • All inclusive Dinner - 7:30 PM - 2 AM
  • Reception only - 8:30 PM - 2 AM
  • Party only - 9:30 PM - 2 AM

As the clock strikes midnight, ring in 2012 with tons of party favors and a countdown celebration on huge video displays!

Cost: Prices are increasing as we get closer to the event. So if you are interested in this event, go to The Boston Event Guide's website ASAP for details before the price goes up again.

http://bostoneventguide.com/events/nye.htm

** Get an extra $10 off the prevailing ticket price by using the "Coupon code": NYEVIP11 **

Robyn and several of our other members have attended multiple years in a row because we have had such a great time at this event!
item.name: New Year's Resolution Ball 2012
